document.docAuthor: Alipanah, Helen, Yakovlev, Roman, Falsafi, Hossein, Witt, Thomas & Saldaitis, Aidas

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phalaena castaneae Hübner, 1790
, Beitr. Ges. Schmett. 2: 9.
LT: Europe. Type material is lost.

=
Phalena (Bombyx) arundinis Hübner
, [1802–1808], Samml. Eur. Schmett.: 151.
LT: Europe. Type material is lost.

=
Phragmatoecia cinerea Teich, 1884
, Stett. Ent. Ztg. 44: 212.

LT: Schifmoor bei Kemmern [ Germany ]. Type material ( syntypes ) are lost
.

=
Phragmataecia castaneae
ab. (mut?) nov. melaina Daniel, 1929 , Mitt. Münch. Ent. Ges. 19: 82.

LT: Hung. c. Tatárszentryörgy [ Hungary ]. Type material ( syntypes ) in MWM
.

=
Phragmatoecia castanea sicca Dannehl, 1929
, Ent. Zschr. 43 (12): 148.
LT: Terlan, Lana, Sigmundskron, Ala, Caldonazzo [N. Italy ]. Type material is probably lost.

=
Phragmataecia castaneae
f. fusca Lempke, 1961 , Tijdschr. Entomol. 104: 179.

paragraph.materialsCitation: LT: Woerdense Verlaat [ The Netherlands ]. Type material ( holotype ) in coll. van Aartsen.

subSubSection.paragraph:
=
Phragmataecia castaneae leonadae Gómez-Bustillo, 1977
, SHILAP–Rev. Lepidop. 5 (17): 96.

LT:
Torre la Sal , T.M.
de Cabanes, Castellón [ Spain ]. Type material ( holotype ) in coll. National de SHILAP
.

Distribution in Iran .
According to the present study this species is distributed in Ardebil , Fars , Ilam and Khuzestan Provinces ( Fig. 35B ). However,
Wieser et al . (2001)
have reported it from Golestan Province ( Golestan National Park: Ghale Palangan, Sasan, Mianghaleh).
